trans-unit.source: Exposes the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header" /> of a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn" /> that is in a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> to UI Automation.
trans-unit.target: 向 UI 自动化公开 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn" /> 的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header" /> in the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn" /> that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn" /> 中的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" />。

trans-unit.source: The column that is associated with the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header" /> 关联的列。

trans-unit.source: The automation peer for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter" /> that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" />.
trans-unit.target: 与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.Primitives.DataGridColumnHeadersPresenter" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.DataGrid" /> 的自动化对等方。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> 类的新实例。

trans-unit.source: Gets the control type for the header that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> 关联的标头的控件类型。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetAutomationControlType" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.HeaderItem" /> enumeration value.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="F:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationControlType.HeaderItem" /> 枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Gets a name that differentiates the header that is represented by this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个名称，该名称用于区分由此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> 表示的标头。

trans-unit.source: This method is called by <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" />.
trans-unit.target: 此方法由 <see cref="M:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.AutomationPeer.GetClassName" /> 调用。

trans-unit.source: The type name of the <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header" /> property that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 与此 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn.Header" /> 关联的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> 属性的类型名称。

trans-unit.source: An enumeration value that specifies the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 指定控件模式的枚举值。

trans-unit.source: Returns the object that supports the specified control pattern of the element that is associated with this automation peer.
trans-unit.target: 返回支持与此自动化对等方关联的元素的指定控件模式的对象。

trans-unit.source: The current <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> object, if <paramref name="patternInterface" /> is a supported value; otherwise, <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果 <paramref name="patternInterface" /> 是受支持的值，则为当前的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> 对象；否则为 <see langword="null" />。

trans-unit.source: If one of the following cases occurs, this method returns the current <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> object:
trans-unit.target: 如果发生以下情况之一，此方法将返回当前<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>对象：

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be sorted.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` 是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Invoke?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>与此关联的对象<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>可以进行排序。

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType> and the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn> object that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> can be resized by the user.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` 是<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.Transform?displayProperty=nameWithType>和<xref:System.Windows.Controls.DataGridColumn>与此关联的对象<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>可以由用户调整大小。

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` 为 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.ScrollItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: `patternInterface` is <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.VirtualizedItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: `patternInterface` 为 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.PatternInterface.VirtualizedItem?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that indicates whether the element that is associated with this automation peer contains data that is presented to the user.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示与此自动化对等方关联的元素是否包含向用户显示的数据。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: Sends a request to activate a control and initiate its single, unambiguous action.
trans-unit.target: 发送请求以激活控件并启动其单一、明确的操作。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IInvokeProvider> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Scrolls the header and column that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> into view.
trans-unit.target: 将与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> 关联的标头和列滚动到视图中。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IScrollItemProvider> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the column can be moved.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定列是否可移动。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the column can be resized.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指定列是否可调整大小。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the element can be resized; otherwise <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: 如果元素可以调整大小，则为 <see langword="true" />，否则为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value that specifies whether the control can be rotated.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示控件是否可旋转。

trans-unit.source: <see langword="false" /> in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均为 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The column that is associated with this <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> cannot be moved.
trans-unit.target: 与此关联的列<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>无法移动。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: The new width of the column, in pixels.
trans-unit.target: 列的新宽度（以像素为单位）。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: Resizes the width of the column that is associated with the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" />.
trans-unit.target: 调整与 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> 关联的列的宽度。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.ITransformProvider> 接口时使用。

trans-unit.source: The column that is associated with this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> cannot be resized.
trans-unit.target: 无法调整与此 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer" /> 关联的列的大小。

trans-unit.source: This parameter is not used.
trans-unit.target: 未使用此参数。

trans-unit.source: Throws an exception in all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下均引发异常。

trans-unit.source: The column that is associated with the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> cannot be rotated.
trans-unit.target: 与关联的列<xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer>在无法旋转。

trans-unit.source: In all cases.
trans-unit.target: 在所有情况下。

trans-unit.source: Makes the virtual column fully accessible as a UI Automation element.
trans-unit.target: 使虚拟列像 UI 自动化元素一样可完全访问。

trans-unit.source: This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
trans-unit.target: 此成员是显式的接口成员实现。

trans-unit.source: It can be used only when the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider> interface.
trans-unit.target: 它只能在 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Peers.DataGridColumnHeaderItemAutomationPeer> 实例强制转换为 <xref:System.Windows.Automation.Provider.IVirtualizedItemProvider> 接口时使用。
